summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Aumryx Teach platform - Teacher Browse Page, Teacher Profile Page, Admin Panel Access Control, and Teacher Verification features. All 23 backend API tests passed. All frontend UI tests passed.

issues: All teacher cards use the same default profile image - consider adding unique images for better visual distinction

critical_code_review_comments: Admin panel correctly restricts access to founder only (aumryx@gmail.com)
Teacher verification/unverification working correctly with proper success messages
Backend admin routes properly protected with verify_founder_access dependency
Frontend correctly shows Access Denied screen for non-founder users
seed_data_creation: Test accounts created: founder (aumryx@gmail.com) and test student (teststudent_admin@test.com)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working: 1) Teacher Browse Page displays verified teachers with search/filter, 2) Teacher Profile Page shows teacher details fetched from API, 3) Admin Panel redirects unauthenticated users to login, 4) Admin Panel shows Access Denied for non-founder users, 5) Founder has full admin access with verify/unverify functionality working correctly

teacher_browse_page.details: Displays 9 verified teachers, search and filter working, teacher cards clickable

teacher_profile_page.details: Fetches teacher data from API, displays name, subjects, bio, qualification, courses, contact info

admin_panel_non_founder.details: Shows Access Denied screen with logged-in email displayed

admin_panel_founder.details: Full access granted, shows pending and all teachers tabs

teacher_verification.details: Verify and unverify buttons work, success messages displayed
